reviewText: These 3 dvd's are the best compilation so far on the events and cover-up regarding 9/11.Radar images tell us they did knowwhere the "planes" were on that day.Independant testing of cell phones showed that the published calls could not have takenplace at that altitude and speed.The two film clips of the attack on the Pentagon when syncronised showed that tampering hadtaken place as they should have shown exactly what hit the building but did'nt,anyone surprised?.You can clearly hear manyexplosions happening during the collapses of those buildings..how did Bin Laden plant those? The experts from NIST are madeto look like show room dummies for the government and the debunkers laughable decoys.Highly recommended viewing from adirector who was not afraid to gather evidence from many sources and then prove or dis-prove in front of your very eyes.
Title: September 11 - The New Pearl Harbor

reviewText: Very fact based Q&A based documentary, leaving out  very few areas of inquiry. Excellent roundup of all the basic inconsistencies of the official version of events surrounded by the facts.
Title: September 11 - The New Pearl Harbor

reviewText: Among the many things relating to "911" that might be classified as "scary," by far the scariest is the simple fact that the truth of what happened was right there, staring everyone in the face, all along.  As this documentary painstakingly demonstrates, the very elements - atoms, molecules, metals and minerals comprising the buildings and planes - all point away from anything and everything laid out in the "Official" version and inescapably toward the use of explosives to bring the buildings down. Of course, many have already made the very arguments made in this documentary, but none have made these arguments so compellingly.Other than providing more than adequate evidence to support the controlled demolition dynamic, there is no agenda here.  No one is being blamed, no one is being exonerated.  Rather, the "chips" are allowed to fall wherever they may.  Step by step, each argument presented by the supporters of the "Official" version is examined and, ultimately, rejected as its various components are shown to be untenable.  And, along with the "Official" arguments, the smug self-assurance of their proponents is left to free fall into oblivion.This is truly the "Gold Standard" of "911" documentaries.  And, at the end, it's left to the viewer to decide if the case presented is valid.  There's no attempt to shove anything down people's throats, or to impugn anyone who fails to agree with the film maker's presentation.  There doesn't have to be: the evidence says it all.
Title: September 11 - The New Pearl Harbor

reviewText: I've seen a lot of 9/11 documentaries, and this is by the far the most comprehensive and well-organized. It's also pretty digestible for newcomers to the subject, and is probably the best introduction for them. It doesn't try to present any final answers to the mysteries of 9/11; it focuses on laying out all of the discrepancies in the official story in the hope that Americans will demand a new investigation. Using clips from various news reports, TV specials, interviews and conferences, critics and defenders of the official story are both fairly represented.
Title: September 11 - The New Pearl Harbor

reviewText: I have 3 DVDs on 9/11 ("9/11: Explosive Evidence", "9/11 Press For Truth" and "Why The Towers Fell" from NOVA. These are all very good, but this 3 DVD set from Massimo Mazzucco is the best: it is unbiased and gives a complete picture of what really happened on 9/11 from many viewpoints.
summary: A Comprehensive View of 9/11 Which Will Appeal To Both Sides. Highly Recommended.
Title: September 11 - The New Pearl Harbor
